Pages

Responsiveness

Description

RRRRRR used for responsive layouts.

Example

Technical description

Since Compass has no support yet for Flexbox there is a set of mixins created using SCSS Flexbox Mixins

Source code

Code snippets

  • @mixin portrait {
  @media only screen and (max-width: $breakpoint-small-screen) {
    @content
  }
}

@mixin large-screen-and-up {
  @media only screen and (min-width: $breakpoint-large-screen) {
    @content
  }
}
